The largest bhanyadas are made up of tens of thousands of component parts, all mashed together into a roughly humanoid shape that walks on stumpy legs. Bhanyada behemoths usually have at least four thick arms ending in meaty fists, although some behemoths have a profusion of hands sprouting from their torsos. A bhanyada behemoth's head is studded with tiny eyes all over its surface that observe the surrounding terrain and give information so the entire amalgamation can move in unison. **[Recall Knowledge - Aberration](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)): DC 32 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 30 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 27 [Bhanyada Behemoth](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2518) **Source** [Pathfinder #190: The Choosing](/Sources.aspx?ID=198) pg. 85 **Perception** +23; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** [Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13); (can't speak any language) **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +23, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +21 **Str** +7 **Dex** +2 **Con** +5 **Int** -3 **Wis** +5 **Cha** -1 --- **AC** 31 [all-around vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=1) **Fort** +25 **Ref** +20 **Will** +23 **HP** 250 **Resistances** bludgeoning 10 **Weaknesses** slashing 10 **Extraneous Flesh** **Frequency** three times per day; **Trigger** A Strike scores a critical hit on the bhanyada behemoth; **Effect** A critical hit might simply sever a component chunk that the bhanyada can lose without much harm. The bhanyada behemoth attempts a DC 11 flat check. On a success, it doesn't take any extra damage from the critical hit (although it takes other effects normally, such as [critical specialization effects](/Rules.aspx?ID=235)).
**Odor of Rot** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [olfactory](/Traits.aspx?ID=246)) 10 feet. Creatures other than [aberration](/Traits.aspx?ID=1) that enter or start their turn in the bhanyada's aura must succeed at a DC 29 Fortitude save or become [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) (sickened 2 on a critical failure). A creature that succeeds at its save is temporarily immune for 1 minute.
**[Catch Rock](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=7)** --- **Speed** 40 feet **Melee** fist +26 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)), **Damage** 3d12+10 bludgeoning plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18) **Ranged** rock +26 ([Brutal](/Traits.aspx?ID=249), [range increment 120 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)), **Damage** 3d6+10 bludgeoning **Lumbering Swings** The bhanyada behemoth Strides and makes up to four fist Strikes at any point during that movement. Each Strike must target a different creature. The attacks take the normal multiple attack penalty. **[Throw Rock](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=38)**
name: Bhanyada Behemoth
